document_data.name: ''Slippers of Shadowwalking''
document_data.creator: [[Marune]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Slippers of shadowwalking''''' was a [[magic item]] that allowed the wearer to ''[[shadow walk]]''.
document_data.Description: The slippers were soft and black.
document_data.Powers: The wearer could use the ''shadow walk'' ability once per day.
document_data.History: ''Slippers of shadowwalking'' were first created by [[Marune]] who later shared their creation process with the [[Shadow Thieves]] of [[Amn]].
